prompt: Create a vibrant 'Contact Us' page with a light purple background (Color(0xFFEDE7F6)). Feature a centered 'Get in Touch' title in deep purple (Color(0xFF673AB7)) with a font size of 32 and bold weight. Include a subtitle in grey (Color(0xFF757575)) below, inviting users to connect. Arrange three contact methods (Phone: +1 234 567 8900, Email: support@company.com, Address: 456 Main St, City, Country) in a grid layout (2x1 for phone and email, full-width for address) with cards having a white background, elevation 3, and rounded corners (radius 10). Use purple icons (Color(0xFF673AB7)) for phone, email, and location. Below, add a contact form with Name, Email, Subject, and Message fields, using filled text fields with light purple (Color(0xFFF3E5F5)) backgrounds and purple borders. Include a full-width purple 'Send Message' button. Apply padding of EdgeInsets.all(18) and 14 pixels vertical spacing between sections for a balanced, colorful design using a Column layout.
